languages.text: {n}Маражай поворачивается к вам, держа в руке переливающийся потусторонним пламенем кристалл.{/n} "{name}... взгляни на это. Душа твоего врага — в твоей ладони, полностью подвластная тебе и твоим желаниям. Не это ли величайшая месть за нанесенные обиды?"

{n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай поворачивается к вам, держа в руке переливающийся потусторонним пламенем кристалл.{/n} "{name}... взгляни на это. Душа твоего врага — в твоей ладони, полностью подвластная тебе и твоим желаниям. Не это ли величайшая месть за нанесенные обиды?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋转向你，手中握着一块水晶，水晶散发着异界的火焰。{/n}“{name}……看看这个吧。你的敌人的灵魂如今就在你的手中，完全受你控制，由你摆布。这才是对过去的不公最好的报复，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋转向你，手中握着一块水晶，水晶散发着异界的火焰。{/n}“{name}……看看这个吧。你的敌人的灵魂如今就在你的手中，完全受你控制，由你摆布。这才是对过去的不公最好的报复，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがこちらを向く―その手には別世界の炎が煌めくクリスタルを持っていた。{/n}「{name}…これを見ろ。手のひらに転がる敵の魂、それを完全に手懐け、後は俺の情け次第というワケだ。過去の過ちに対する最高の復讐じゃないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがこちらを向く―その手には別世界の炎が煌めくクリスタルを持っていた。{/n}「{name}…これを見ろ。手のひらに転がる敵の魂、それを完全に手懐け、後は俺の情け次第というワケだ。過去の過ちに対する最高の復讐じゃないか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti con un cristal que reluce con fuego antinatural en la mano.{/n} «{name}... mira esto. Tienes el alma de tu enemiga en la palma de tu mano, bajo tu control absoluto, a merced de tus caprichos. ¿No es esa la mayor venganza para cualquier afrenta?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti con un cristal que reluce con fuego antinatural en la mano.{/n} "{name}... mira esto. Tienes el alma de tu enemiga en la palma de tu mano, bajo tu control absoluto, a merced de tus caprichos. ¿No es esa la mayor venganza para cualquier afrenta?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, tenant dans sa main un cristal brasillant d'une flamme surnaturelle.{/n} « Admirez un peu le travail, {name}... L'âme de mon ennemie tient dans le creux de ma main, à la merci de mes moindres caprices et entièrement soumise à ma volonté. N'est-ce pas la plus belle façon de laver les offenses du passé ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, tenant dans sa main un cristal brasillant d'une flamme surnaturelle.{/n} « Admirez un peu le travail, {name}... L'âme de mon ennemie tient dans le creux de ma main, à la merci de mes moindres caprices et entièrement soumise à ma volonté. N'est-ce pas la plus belle façon de laver les offenses du passé ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich dir zu – er hält einen Kristall in der Hand, der mit außerweltlichem Feuer flackert.{/n} "{name}, schaut ihn Euch an. Die Seele Eures Feindes liegt in Eurer Handfläche. Sie ist komplett unter Eurer Kontrolle und auf Eure Gnade angewiesen. Die größtmögliche Rache für vergangenes Unrecht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich dir zu – er hält einen Kristall in der Hand, der mit außerweltlichem Feuer flackert.{/n} "{name}, schaut ihn Euch an. Die Seele Eures Feindes liegt in Eurer Handfläche. Sie ist komplett unter Eurer Kontrolle und auf Eure Gnade angewiesen. Die größtmögliche Rache für vergangenes Unrecht!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor. Elinde âdeta bu dünyadan olmayan bir alevle parıldayan bir kristal tutuyor.{/n} "{name}... Şuna baksana. Düşmanının ruhu avucunun içinde, kontrolün altında, arzularının merhametine sığınmış. Geçmişteki yanlışların intikamını almanın daha iyi bir yolu var mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you — he is holding a crystal coruscating with otherworldly fire.{/n} "{name}... look at this. Your enemy's soul is in the palm of your hand, under your complete control, at the mercy of your desires. Is this not the greatest revenge for past wrongs?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor. Elinde âdeta bu dünyadan olmayan bir alevle parıldayan bir kristal tutuyor.{/n} "{name}... Şuna baksana. Düşmanının ruhu avucunun içinde, kontrolün altında, arzularının merhametine sığınmış. Geçmişteki yanlışların intikamını almanın daha iyi bir yolu var mı?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
